=== Personal stuff ===

I'm French, was born in Caen in 1984, got into computers in primary school with my brother's Amstrad CPC 6128 (god Basic sucked), got an engineer diploma in order to earn a living with a computer job, worked in China for 2 years, got married and had a kid, then moved to Paris, then moved to Southern California.
